sys_remote_update_set.description: This update set contains all necessary backend adjustments. The PayPal Service Portal widget will try to set the "Payment Received" Date/Time field on the Requested Item table. The included Workflow will utilize this field to wait for a value in that field - otherwise it won't continue.
sys_remote_update_set.name: Service Portal PayPal HackLab #1 - Backend
